value.title: Add measures in bulk to your Power BI file without external tools
value.excerpt: In todays video I am going to show you how to add measures in bulk to Power BI without using external tools. Why you may ask? value.title: Can you solve this murder with Power BI? | Perfect for Power BI beginners
